name: 9SLIDES, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud based presentation platform. The company delivers mobile technology for employees to watch video presentations, answer quizzes to test their knowledge, and to create their own presentations to share. The company also provides real-time analytics to employers on completion rates and comprehension.
